cases.description: Support notes: needs urgent attention. Impact: critical.

cases.title: Delivery status not updating
cases.description: Observed spinners never stop. Expected a validation message.

cases.title: UI layout broken on Firefox
cases.description: Customer reports that user sees another customer's data (suspected). Steps tried: disabled extensions, tried incognito mode, used another browser.

cases.title: Intermittent error: E401
cases.description: Happens for all accounts in one company. Started after enabling SSO.

cases.title: Pagination is broken after update
cases.description: Happens for all accounts in one company. Started yesterday.

cases.title: Role permissions is slow after update
cases.description: Issue reproduced on staging. Error message: 'Request timed out'.

cases.title: Delivery ETA is incorrect
cases.description: Customer reports that user sees another customer's data (suspected). Steps tried: used another browser, cleared cache and cookies.

cases.title: Reports show stale data
cases.description: Issue reproduced on production. Error message: 'Something went wrong'.

cases.title: User cannot login
cases.description: Customer reports that invoice download returns an empty PDF. Steps tried: tried incognito mode, cleared cache and cookies, disabled extensions, switched network.

cases.title: Intermittent error: E_RATE_LIMIT
cases.description: Support notes: high volume complaint. Impact: low.

cases.title: Intermittent error: E_RATE_LIMIT
cases.description: Observed UI flickers. Expected a validation message.

cases.title: Reports show stale data
cases.description: Observed spinners never stop. Expected a validation message.

cases.title: Windows app crashes on launch
cases.description: Support notes: needs urgent attention. Impact: critical.

cases.title: iOS app crashes on launch
cases.description: Customer reports that button does nothing when clicked. Steps tried: tried incognito mode, switched network, restarted the app.

cases.title: Account cannot be verified
cases.description: Customer reports that user sees another customer's data (suspected). Steps tried: tried incognito mode, reset password, switched network.

cases.title: User cannot open dashboard
cases.description: Observed duplicate rows appear. Expected a smooth page load.

cases.title: Windows app logs out randomly
cases.description: Support notes: cannot reproduce consistently. Impact: medium.

cases.title: Payment duplicated
cases.description: Customer reports that button does nothing when clicked. Steps tried: reset password, restarted the app, cleared cache and cookies.

cases.title: Delivery wrong address saved
cases.description: Happens for one user. Started today.

cases.title: Intermittent error: E500
cases.description: Happens for newly created accounts. Started today.

cases.title: Windows app shows blank screen
cases.description: Observed spinners never stop. Expected a smooth page load.

cases.title: Role permissions is incorrect after update
cases.description: Observed data is not saved. Expected the updated data to persist.

cases.title: Intermittent error: E500
cases.description: Customer reports that invoice download returns an empty PDF. Steps tried: tried incognito mode, used another browser.

cases.title: Intermittent error: E500
cases.description: Customer reports that request returns 500 error. Steps tried: used another browser, disabled extensions, restarted the app.

cases.title: Reports show stale data
cases.description: Happens for one user. Started yesterday.

cases.title: Pagination is missing after update
cases.description: Customer reports that 2FA code is rejected. Steps tried: switched network, restarted the app.

cases.title: UI layout broken on Safari
cases.description: Support notes: customer is blocked. Impact: high.

cases.title: iOS app crashes on launch
cases.description: Observed random 403 responses. Expected a smooth page load.

cases.title: iOS app crashes on launch
cases.description: Issue reproduced on QA environment. Error message: 'Access denied'.

cases.title: macOS app shows blank screen
cases.description: Support notes: customer is blocked. Impact: low.

cases.title: Payment refunded incorrectly
cases.description: Customer reports that rate-limited unexpectedly during normal usage. Steps tried: tried incognito mode, switched network.

cases.title: User cannot submit form
cases.description: Happens for one user. Started after changing plan.

cases.title: Password policy is missing after update
cases.description: Observed duplicate rows appear. Expected a smooth page load.

cases.title: macOS app shows blank screen
cases.description: Customer reports that user sees another customer's data (suspected). Steps tried: disabled extensions, tried incognito mode.

cases.title: UI layout broken on Chrome
cases.description: Observed spinners never stop. Expected a validation message.

cases.title: UI layout broken on Safari
cases.description: Observed data is not saved. Expected a smooth page load.

cases.title: Intermittent error: E_RATE_LIMIT
cases.description: Customer reports that login fails even with correct password. Steps tried: disabled extensions, used another browser, cleared cache and cookies, switched network.

cases.title: Role permissions is incorrect after update
cases.description: Support notes: customer is blocked. Impact: medium.

cases.title: User cannot change plan
cases.description: Customer reports that user sees another customer's data (suspected). Steps tried: used another browser, reset password, disabled extensions.

cases.title: Account locked unexpectedly
cases.description: Happens for one user. Started yesterday.

cases.title: Reports show missing rows
cases.description: Happens for VIP customers. Started today.

cases.title: Payment stuck in pending
cases.description: Happens for one user. Started after enabling SSO.

cases.title: Payment stuck in pending
cases.description: Issue reproduced on production. Error message: 'Something went wrong'.

cases.title: Windows app logs out randomly
cases.description: Happens for newly created accounts. Started after enabling SSO.

cases.title: Reports show missing rows
cases.description: Customer reports that invoice download returns an empty PDF. Steps tried: cleared cache and cookies, disabled extensions, used another browser.

cases.title: Email sending is broken after update
cases.description: Customer reports that user sees another customer's data (suspected). Steps tried: cleared cache and cookies, restarted the app, tried incognito mode, disabled extensions.

cases.title: Intermittent error: E502
cases.description: Customer reports that 2FA code is rejected. Steps tried: reset password, tried incognito mode, switched network, restarted the app.

cases.title: UI layout broken on Firefox
cases.description: Happens for all accounts in one company. Started after changing plan.

cases.description: Customer reports that login fails even with correct password. Steps tried: reset password, switched network, restarted the app.
